title: The Power of C#
description: At Origin Softwares, our experienced developers have mastered the art of using Xamarin to create applications with 100% native code. With over 85 successfully completed projects under our belt, we know how to make the most of this powerful framework. title: Industries and Possibilities
description: We at Origin Softwares develop mobile applications using Xamarin, which is advantageous for apps of any complexity. With Xamarin, you get an app with native performance, 100% hardware usage, and high FPS. This ensures easy realization and support of the following:
